originalText.text: Dr. Frid has been life changing. She listens intently to her patients with care and tailors the treatment. She has truly changed the quality of my life. I am forever grateful to have a doctor that I trust so much!

text.text: Dr. Frid has been life changing. She listens intently to her patients with care and tailors the treatment. She has truly changed the quality of my life. I am forever grateful to have a doctor that I trust so much!

originalText.text: There is no doubt that Dr. Frid saved my life. I had been sick for almost two years before I met her. I had brain fog, joint pain and my blood pressure totally out of control even with medication. I had seen my primary doctor and several specialists before going to her. They all said the same thing, they did know what was wrong with me . I had discussed tick borne illnesses with them and they said I did not have Lyme . I asked about Bartonella which I believed I had and they did try testing for it but negative results which is common. Dr Frid diagnosed Bartonella on the first appointment and Lyme when the specialized test came back later. She treated me for both. I am well today thanks to Dr Frid

originalText.text:
My daughter has been a patient of Dr. Frid for the past four years. Dr. Frid and her team are a safe haven for patients with PANS, PANDAS, Lyme and other diseases that the vast majority of  specialists are not interested in or not prepared to treat.
We are fortunate to have Dr. Frid leading my daughter’s treatment, and as a family, we are thankful for her dedication and expertise in treating complex illnesses.

originalText.text: Dr. Frid has been treating my daughters, in an amazing way, not only as a doctor, as well as a fantastic/ incredible human being. We feel blessed to have chosen her as our doctor because of her expertise and incredible ability to make you feel comfortable with treatments/challenges.

text.text: Dr. Frid has been treating my daughters, in an amazing way, not only as a doctor, as well as a fantastic/ incredible human being. We feel blessed to have chosen her as our doctor because of her expertise and incredible ability to make you feel comfortable with treatments/challenges.

originalText.text:
Dr. Frid is the best!!!  She and her staff are exceptional.  My daughter has recovered 100% because of Dr. Frid.
Dr. Frid didn't give us any false hopes and she never looked at us with sad eyes seeing only the brokenness.  It was clear we were all working towards the same goal of complete healing.  Dr. Frid is a hard-working, smart doctor who continues to educate herself on the latest treatments.  She has a very clear plan for treatment tailored to each specific patient.  Our process was slow and thoughtful because of the extreme vulnerability. The process was hard but worth the effort,  with each step, the symptoms began to resolve.  We never felt alone in this recovery and we were given choices for treatment options that we were comfortable with and understood.  Dr. Frid, nurse Melanie, and the staff have all been efficient, effective, and professional to our whole family.  They are the best and I am grateful that Dr. Frid had the courage to try and help.   After missing 2.5 years of school, my daughter is now back better than ever enjoying life as she did before this illness.
